data.name: Spellcheck_Install_ProjectHeader
data.value: This project is configured to use "{0}" for spellchecking, but that dictionary is not installed.

data.name: Spellcheck_Install_ConfigHeader
data.value: Ameko is configured to use "{0}" for spellchecking, but that dictionary is not installed.

data.name: Spellcheck_Install_Capabilities
data.value: Ameko can download the required dictionary for you.

data.name: Spellcheck_Install_Notice
data.value: Spellcheck functionality will be unavailable without the dictionary.

data.name: Spellcheck_Label_NotFound
data.value: This word was not found in the spelling dictionary.

data.name: Spellcheck_Button_AddToProject_ToolTip
data.value: Save this word to the current Project's word list

data.value: Save this word to the Global word list

data.name: Spellcheck_Button_AddToBoth_ToolTip
data.value: Save this word to the current Project and the Global word list

data.value: No issues found in the current document.
